ygData.subject: Re: Gob Pets in Oasis?
ygData.msgSnippet: Yea.. that certainly does sorta bring back my spirit into the game.. i dunno but it just didn t seem as fun as it used to... especially for me... i have a lev
ygData.messageBody:
Yea.. that certainly does sorta bring back my spirit into the game.. i dunno
but it just didn't seem as fun as it used to... especially for me... i have a
lev 18 magician (DE) on veeshan and am pretty proud of him... but its hard to
level... and most of the stuff i hear about going on.. even to get the nicer
items, you need to be lev 30+... and i don't know if i can hang in there long
enough to reach that lev... though i'd love to do something other than just
hunt all the time... BTW i'm agnostic so basically everyone in nerriak/grobb
and Oggok are dubious to me.. and you know DE's in freeport and other
towns... so in all my searching i have found ONE quest that i can actually
do.. that being the sro research quest (which last time i checked was broken
anyway..) i'm really just looking for things like that, that can bring me
back into the game truely having fun.. even if it means restarting a
character on another server.. (i tried this on Tallon zek.. and 200+ people
in nek forest looking for every last moss snake is no fun.. neither is having
your life savings stollen from you by a lev 8 human who jumps you while your
hunting, 1/8 a bub from lev 4....) anyone have any ideas on things i can do?
Or even a server or guild that i might be able to join that adds more fun and
RPing for the game? anything you have to say would be verry appreciated...

Magis
Gizmo115@...
